short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple color picker extension for Chrome. No special permissions. No signup. No ads. No tracking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Just Color Picker" browser extension is a simple, privacy-friendly way to inspect any website and get HEX, RGB, and the nearest Tailwind CSS color. Here are some features:

- Pick a color for any website. Click on extension icon to open the color picker.
- Quickly get HEX and RGB values. To use in your designs or code.
- See the nearest Tailwind CSS color. To use in your Tailwind CSS projects.
- No special permissions required. You can trust that your information is secure as our extension does not need any permissions to run.
- No 3rd party trackers or ads. We value your privacy and ensure that the extension does not contain third-party trackers or ads that may compromise your data.
- Memory-efficient. The extension only runs when you click the icon, so it won't slow down your device with unnecessary background processes.

What's the catch / why it's free?

This extension is created by HeroTofu.com, we have both free and paid products. Our paid products help pay for the cost of creating and maintaining the free ones, like the "Just Color Picker" extension.

This means we can give you the extension for free, without any hidden costs.
